long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep track of your saved ingredients and compare them with your favorite recipes!

Use your cursor to select ingredients from a recipe website, then right click and choose "Check Pantry" to compare with your saved ingredients. Then watch as Flex Chef automatically populates your grocery list!

Don't forget to check out our mobile app: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.chuiohrobinson.flexchef
